task_iti_radiatus: Participation in the beginnings of the Radiatus project, consisting of the deployment and automatic configuration of Big Data services in the cloud.
task_iti_twitter: System to collect data from Twitter and generate HTML reports with interactive graphics integrating technologies such as Spark, Kafka, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL and Neo4j on Kubernetes.
task_iti_iot: Development and deployment of different microservices in an IoT device for remote monitoring and control of industrial machines.
task_iti_forecasting: Development and deployment of a global machine learning model for the prediction of fruit and vegetable sales in a supermarket using Azure ML
task_iti_prototypes: Development of prototypes integrating technologies such as Spark, Neo4j, Elasticsearch, Kibana and Grafana. Creation of simple web interfaces in some of them.
task_iti_eda: Conducting small and large scale exploratory data analysis.
task_iti_mlops: Packaging and deployment of Machine Learning models as REST APIs using Docker.
task_iti_reports: Preparation of reports, presentations and project documentation using Markdown, Word, Power Point or Latex.
task_dialapplet_pfc: Development of an answering machine detector
task_dialapplet_development: Participation in the development of functionalities and bug correction in the Dialapplet call center management platform, both in backend and frontend.
task_dialapplet_proxy: Proxy for communication with Asterisk through the AMI interface.
task_dialapplet_reports: Development of a new system to facilitate the generation of reports.
task_dialapplet_support: Technical support for incidents related to the database, Linux servers and networks.
achievement_exp_ii: Best academic record award in Computer science
achievement_exp_ii3: Best academic record award of 3rd course in Computer science
achievement_exp_ii2: Best academic record award of 2nd course in Computer science
